English.Name: Heart Swap
English.Category:
"Basic Information"[CS:E][BAR][CR]
Swaps any modified stat levels and
rates for stats like [CS:E]Attack[CR] and [CS:E]Defense[CR]
with the Pokémon the user is facing.
